AFFIX_DESC_1: Healing in excess of a target's maximum health is instead converted to a heal absorption effect.
AFFIX_DESC_2: Enemies pay far less attention to threat generated by tanks.
AFFIX_DESC_3: While in combat, enemies periodically cause gouts of flame to erupt beneath the feet of distant players.
AFFIX_DESC_4: All enemies' melee attacks apply a stacking blight that inflicts damage over time and reduces healing received.
AFFIX_DESC_5: Additional non-boss enemies are present throughout the dungeon.
AFFIX_DESC_6: Non-boss enemies enrage at 30% health remaining, dealing 100% increased damage until defeated.
AFFIX_DESC_7: When any non-boss enemy dies, its death cry empowers nearby allies, increasing their maximum health and damage by 20%.
AFFIX_DESC_8: When slain, non-boss enemies leave behind a lingering pool of ichor that heals their allies and damages players.
AFFIX_DESC_9: Boss enemies have 40% more health and inflict up to 15% increased damage.
AFFIX_NOTE_9: This can cause many extremely dangerous abilities to one-shot the party if health levels are not high enough.Serves as an additional gear check to these dungeons.Tanks may need to kite bosses more frequently.
AFFIX_DESC_10: Non-boss enemies have 20% more health and inflict up to 30% increased damage.
AFFIX_NOTE_10: Avoid pulling excessive trash packs.Use AoE CC and stuns liberally to reduce damage.Focus on priority targets.Tanks may need to kite enemies more frequently.
AFFIX_DESC_11: When slain, non-boss enemies explode, causing all players to suffer 10% of their max health in damage over 4 sec. This effect stacks.
AFFIX_DESC_12: When injured below 90% health, players will suffer increasing damage over time until healed above 90% health.
AFFIX_DESC_13: While in combat, enemies periodically summon Explosive Orbs that will detonate if not destroyed.
AFFIX_DESC_14: Periodically, all players emit a shockwave, inflicting damage and interrupting nearby allies.
AFFIX_DESC_15: Non-boss enemies are granted temporary immunity to Loss of Control effects.
AFFIX_DESC_16: Some non-boss enemies have been infested with a Spawn of G'huun.
